## core package

## Classes

|  Class | Description |
|  --- | --- |
|  [DocExtension](./core.docextension.md) | The parent node in a Prosemirror Schema. A representation of the doc is required in all editors  |
|  [Extension](./core.extension.md) | Extensions are fundamental to the way that Remirror works and they handle the management of similar concerns. |
|  [ExtensionManager](./core.extensionmanager.md) | A class to manage the extensions and prosemirror interactions of our editor. |
|  [MarkExtension](./core.markextension.md) | All mark extensions should be created from here. |
|  [NodeExtension](./core.nodeextension.md) | Defines an abstract class for creating extensions which can place nodes into the prosemirror state. |
|  [TextExtension](./core.textextension.md) | The default text passed into the prosemirror schema. |

## Variables

|  Variable | Description |
|  --- | --- |
|  [isExtension](./core.isextension.md) | Determines if the passed in extension is a any type of extension. |
|  [isExtensionManager](./core.isextensionmanager.md) | Checks to see whether this is an extension manager |
|  [isMarkExtension](./core.ismarkextension.md) | Determines if the passed in extension is a mark extension. Useful as a type guard where a particular type of extension is needed. |
|  [isNodeExtension](./core.isnodeextension.md) | Determines if the passed in extension is a node extension. Useful as a type guard where a particular type of extension is needed. |
|  [isPlainExtension](./core.isplainextension.md) | Checks whether the this is an extension and if it is a plain one |

|  Type Alias | Description |
|  --- | --- |
|  [ActionNames](./core.actionnames.md) | Utility type for pulling all the action names from a list |
|  [ActionsFromExtensions](./core.actionsfromextensions.md) | Utility type which receives an extension and provides the type of actions it makes available. |
|  [AnyExtension](./core.anyextension.md) | Provides a type annotation which is applicable to any extension type. |
|  [AnyExtensionManager](./core.anyextensionmanager.md) | The utility for capturing all the possible <code>ExtensionManager</code> type variations. |
|  [CommandsOfExtension](./core.commandsofextension.md) | Utility type for retrieving the commands provided by an extension. |
|  [DataOfExtension](./core.dataofextension.md) | Utility type for retrieving the extension data object made available from the extension. |
|  [ExtensionsFromManager](./core.extensionsfrommanager.md) | Retrieve the extensions from an <code>ExtensionManager</code>. |
|  [FlexibleExtension](./core.flexibleextension.md) | Either a PrioritizedExtension or the actual Extension. |
|  [FlexibleExtensions](./core.flexibleextensions.md) |  |
|  [FromFlexibleExtension](./core.fromflexibleextension.md) |  |
|  [HelperNames](./core.helpernames.md) | Utility type for pulling all the action names from a list |
|  [HelpersFromExtensions](./core.helpersfromextensions.md) | Utility type which receives an extension and provides the type of helpers it makes available. |
|  [HelpersOfExtension](./core.helpersofextension.md) | Utility type for retrieving the helpers provided by an extension. |
|  [InferFlexibleExtension](./core.inferflexibleextension.md) | Get the extension from a PrioritizedExtension. |
|  [InferFlexibleExtensionList](./core.inferflexibleextensionlist.md) | Get the extension types from a list of PrioritizedExtensions. |
|  [MapCommandToAction](./core.mapcommandtoaction.md) | A utility type which maps the passed in extension command in an action that is called via <code>manager.data.actions.commandName()</code>. |
|  [MapHelpers](./core.maphelpers.md) | A utility type which maps the passed in extension helpers to a method called with <code>manager.data.helpers.helperName()</code>. |
|  [MarkNames](./core.marknames.md) | A utility type for retrieving the name of an extension only when it's a mark extension. |
|  [NameOfExtension](./core.nameofextension.md) | Utility type for retrieving the name of an extension. |
|  [NodeNames](./core.nodenames.md) | A utility type for retrieving the name of an extension only when it's a node extension. |
|  [OptionsOfExtension](./core.optionsofextension.md) | Utility type for retrieving the extension options from an extension. |
|  [PlainNames](./core.plainnames.md) | A utility type for retrieving the name of an extension only when it's a plain extension. |
|  [ProsemirrorTypeOfExtension](./core.prosemirrortypeofextension.md) | Utility type for retrieving the prosemirror type of the extension which can be:<!-- -->- <code>NodeType</code> - <code>MarkType</code> - <code>never</code> |
|  [SchemaFromExtensions](./core.schemafromextensions.md) | Gets the schema from a list of extensions |
|  [TypeOfExtensionClass](./core.typeofextensionclass.md) | Retrieve the instance type from an ExtensionClass. |
|  [TypeOfExtensionClassList](./core.typeofextensionclasslist.md) | This is a utility type which allows for retrieving the instance types from an array of Extensions. |
